thread.section_title: NamasteVapes Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NamasteVapes Australia | namastevaporizers.com.au
thread.title: leadfoot

author: leadfoot
title: leadfoot
text:
They seem to be honest. I nearly purchased something weeks ago and got into communication with one of the Managers. He was honest and told me the item I wanted, unfortunately wasn't in stock. So I didnt purchase it.
2 weeks later I was browsing on the site again, and was helped by a service agent (not sure if it was a virtual assistant or a live person) through the website. They said the item was in stock, I purchased on the spot, and a few days later I had the item. Awesome!
Then I started worrying that the package would have Namaste Vapes written on it somewhere, but it didn't. It was discreet as you could have hoped for.
